caption:
🏍 Revving Up to Success! 🏆🔥

Meet the unstoppable DJS Speedsters, the champions of innovation and engineering at D. J. Sanghvi College of Engineering. 🚀🔌

🥇 We took on the FMAE Moto Student 2023 Season 2 at Kari Motor Speedways, and the results are in - We emerged as the "Winners of Design Evaluation," aced the "Endurance Test," and clinched the prestigious title of "Overall Champions in EV Category." 🏁🏆

🔌💡 Our journey isn't just about winning, it's about crafting the future of electric motorcycles, one thrilling ride at a time. 🌟

🤝 We are not only building bikes but also building confidence, knowledge, and a passion for innovation among our talented team.

Join us as we continue to race towards technological advancement, and stay tuned for the electrifying innovations we're set to unveil. 🌐⚡

📣 Calling all students of D.J. Sanghvi College of Engineering – Let's push the boundaries of what's possible together! 🌠💪

#djsspeedsters #fmae #motostudentelectric #electricsuperbike #exhilaratingelectrically #ktm #entrox #speedmerchant #explore #trending #bike #superbikes #electric

If you are considering studying abroad, or you’re just curious about what opportunities are out there, this is the perfect opportunity to gather information, ask questions, and get inspired about your future educational journey.
This event is organized exclusively for DJ Sanghvi Students, so do attend in large numbers.

Date: 15th April 2024
Time: 12.30 pm onwards
Location: class no 47

“First time on the race circuit, and it was a rollercoaster of emotions for Riders! Here’s our Rider-2 expressing his feelings for riding Phantom 2.0 on race circuit for the first time! 🏍️⚡️

#rider #djsspeedsters #ktm #fmae #bikerlife #loveforbike #electric #gogreen #exhilarating_electrically

Our rider’s exciting time at Kari Motor Speedway shows how much they love motorcycling and how teamwork makes dreams come true. Feeling excited at the starting line with their team’s support made their dream feel real. They’ll always remember this and feel grateful for the experience.🏍️⚡️

#djsspeedsters #riders #bike #adrenaline #exhilarating_electrically #ktm #fmaemotopark #fmae #race #karimotorspeedway

Reflecting on an incredible year with DJS Speedsters! 🏍️ Grateful for every teammate who fueled our passion for bikes and a special shoutout to our amazing seniors whose guidance paved our way to victory on the road and in competitions. 🏆 

#2023 #yearend #djsspeedsters #bike #team #gratitude #reelsinstagram #trendingreels #explorepage

Hats off to the incredible riders of DJS Speedsters! Your dedication, skill, and relentless spirit on the race track are the driving force behind our success. Each twist of the throttle, every calculated maneuver – you’ve put your soul into making us national champions in the EV category. Ride on, champions! 🏍️🏆

#djsspeedstersonthetrack #tracksuit #kari #fmae #motostudentelectric #studentteam #exhilarating_electrically #hashtag #champions #bikes #explore #instagram

On November 20, 2023, we proudly unveiled our winning bike, the PHANTOM 2.0⚡️, to our college principal, HOD, and esteemed faculty. This moment marked the culmination of dedicated effort and ingenuity, showcasing the pinnacle of design and engineering excellence.✨

The presence of our college leaders and their appreciation for the PHANTOM 2.0⚡️ underscored the significance of our achievement. This remarkable bike stands as a testament to our commitment to pushing boundaries and redefining what’s possible in the realm of innovative design and technology.🏍️✨

#djsspeedsters #djsce #bike #electricbike #bikelife #explorepage #trending #reelsinstagram #exhilaratingelectrically #unveil #bikeunveil

Where passion meets pavement and dreams ride on two wheels. 🏍️✨ Get ready to witness the revolution as we unveil our electric masterpiece, see y’all tomorrow at 11:30!!🤩🥳
.
.
.
#djspeedster #djsce #ebike #superbike #djs #sae #motolife #explorepage #explore #trends #trendingreels #trending #viral #reels #instagram #bike #unveil #event #ktm

“Unleashing the future on wheels! 🏍️ DJS Speedsters - National Champions in EV category 🏆⚡ Get ready to witness the power, precision, and innovation as we unveil our latest electric superbike masterpiece!” 🚀🔥 #DJSOnWheels #ElectricRevolution #InnovationUnleashed #djsspeedsters #exhilarating_electrically #unveiling #explorepage

🏍️ Join us on a thrilling ride through the incredible journey of DJS Speedsters! 🚀 From commercial bikes in 2018 to conquering the EV category as national champions in 2023, we’ve redefined the limits of innovation.

🛠️ Witness the evolution of our electric superbike, part by part, as we embraced challenges and pioneered the creation of a successful electric prototype. Each component reflects our dedication and passion for technological advancement.

🏆 In FMAE Moto Student season 2, we triumphed as Winners of Design Evaluation, conquered the Endurance test, and emerged as Overall Champions in the EV category. Our journey wasn’t easy, but we persevered, becoming the first student team to build an electric superbike successfully.

🔧 Join us in celebrating the fusion of engineering brilliance and design excellence. Stay tuned as we unveil the heart and soul of our electric masterpiece, showcasing the intricate details that make DJS Speedsters the pride of D. J. Sanghvi College of Engineering. Get ready for a visual feast of innovation! 🚀
